name: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Grants the ability to find hope in the darkest situations, and nearby treasures.

name: The Godfather (Part I)
description: Allows the wearer to persuade any NPC once per game session with an offer they can't refuse

name: The Godfather (Part II)
description: Gives deep insight into complex situations and decisions and advantage on Wisdom saving throws.

name: The Godfather (Part III)
description: Enhances leadership skills, granting party members temporary hit points in combat.

name: The Matrix
description: Unveils the hidden layers of reality, enhancing perception and reaction speed.

name: Nueve Reinas
description: Masters the art of deception, improving negotiation and bartering skills.

name: Inception
description: Sharpens your focus and clarity, allows you to wake up from any sleep effect.

name: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
description: Provides knowledge of the Force, and allows you to hide in plain sight for one turn.

name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
description: Your wit and resourcefulness turn any situation to your advantage. Advantage when attacking first.

name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
description: You harness the power of both the light and dark sides, achieving balance in your actions.

name: The Dark Knight
description: Summons the vigilante spirit within you, increasing your courage and determination.

name: Casablanca
description: Master the art of diplomatic negotiation. Your silver tongue can sway even the most stubborn NPCs.

name: Forrest Gump
description: Master the art of preparing over 21 shrimp dishes, including pineapple shrimp, lemon shri-

name: Gone With The Wind
description: Frankly, you no longer give a damn, allowing you to face anything with rogueish charm.

name: The Revenant
description: Tap into the resilience of Hugh Glass, you can now survive bear attacks. Advantage against beasts.

name: Wild Tales
description: You're a demolitions expert, with a sudden sense of injustice.

name: Cinema Paradiso
description: Receive mentorship from Alfredo. Your understanding of the power of cinema is your greatest asset.

name: Gladiator
description: Reminder of the vengeance you'll have in this life or the next.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: Take Boromir's iconic advice, you'll need resolve for this journey.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
description: Your ability to covet and protect your treasures is unmatched. Also advantage when fishing.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
description: You are the rightful King of Gondor. Your leadership and valor inspire those who follow you.

name: The Prestige
description: Your mastery of illusion and misdirection baffles even the most astute observers.

name: Psycho
description: Extra bonus to deception rolls when impersonating others.

name: Rear Window
description: A keen eye for detail and observation skills make you a master of uncovering hidden truths.

name: Django Unchained
description: You chose to dress this way, your extra confidence gives you a bonus to intimidation checks.

name: Citizen Kane
description: Worth more than all the money in the world.

name: The Lion King
description: It enhances your connection to the Circle of Life. Reduced damage taken against beasts.

name: Alien
description: Grants fearless determination in face of untold horrors.

name: Die Hard
description: Yippee-Ki-Yay Mr Falcon. Falling damage is cut in half.

name: The Raiders of the Lost Ark
description: The coolest man to wear one, you're resourceful in the face of danger.

name: American History X
description: You work to curb hatred and prejudice. Advantage in deescalation.

name: Spirited Away
description: Possess Chihiro's ancestral seal. You can communicate with spirits and gain their assistance.

name: Titanic
description: Gain resistance to cold damage but lose the ability to share.

name: Avatar
description: Possess a sacred Hometree seedling. Gives bonus to Animal Handling.

name: Barbie
description: Gain a deeper understanding of the self and the world around you.

name: Blade Runner
description: Advantage on insight checks. It’s also your birthday and someone gives you a calfskin wallet.

name: Oppenheimer
description: You are become death, destroyer of worlds. Grants temporary boost to damage.

name: Jurassic Park
description: You find a way. Advantage against monsters.

name: E.T the Extra Terrestrial
description: Phone home. Once per day you can send a telepathic message to a creature within 1 mile.

name: Pulp Fiction
description: Whenever you roll a critical failure, you can reroll, because you're a bad mother-

name: Whiplash
description: You gain an innate sense of tempo and rhythm, allowing you to detect when others are rushing or dragging.

name: The Departed
description: Summons a gnawing, cheese eating rat to fight alongside you. And also against you.

name: Training Day
description: The keys to the Monte Carlo can be summoned and driven whenever needed.

name: John Wick
description: Gain proficiency in all ranged weapons and the ability to reload with incredible speed.

name: Jaws
description: Just what you need. Advantage when confronting aquatic threats.

name: The Breakfast Club
description: Channel your inner rebel. Gain the courage to defy authority and inspire your allies to do the same.

name: The Shining
description: Gain knowledge of hidden passages and a resistance to psychic effects.

name: Blues Brothers
description: You're on a mission from God. Gain the ability to charm and persuade others with your musical talents.

name: The Wizard of Oz
description: Click your heels three times to teleport back to a designated safe location.

name: Uncut Gems
description: You immediately get the sense that things are going to go your way.

name: Everything Everywhere All At Once
description: Makes you one with everything.

name: It's A Wonderful Life
description: The power of community shines through you. Heals all party members to maximum health.

name: Seven Samurai
description: This ancient relic encapsulates the essence of samurai spirit and imparts its wisdom to its bearer.

name: Leon: The Professional
description: Always Happy. No questions. Allows you to take damage on behalf of an ally within 30 feet.

name: The Royal Tenenbaums
description: You feel both very lonely and very in love.

name: Scarface
description: Say hello. Sends you into a frenzy, gaining advantage on all attack rolls. Followed by exhaustion.

name: Goodfellas
description: So thin it melts in the sauce. Gain temporary hit points when used.

name: The Big Lebowski
description: It really ties the room together. Advantage on saving throws when standing on the rug.

name: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: Grants increased strength and resilience, and provides an advantage operating vehicles.

name: No Country for Old Men
description: What's the most you ever lost on a coin toss? Flip a coin and either add +10 or -10 to a roll.

name: The Seventh Seal
description: Gives a bonus to death saving rolls.

name: Oldboy
description: Sometimes you have to use something just because it's there.

name: Black Swan
description: Enhances grace and physical prowess, but may cause delusions and paranoia.

name: Harry Potter
description: Significantly boosts magical abilities and combat prowess, but brings with it the risk of corruption.

name: Deadpool
description: You just couldn't resist the allure of Wade Wilson. And who could blame you?

name: Interstellar
description: Summons TARS, a multi-functional robotic companion to offer advice.

name: Iron Man
description: Grants intellect and charisma and also stops shrapnel from hitting your heart,

name: The Martian
description: Delicious at first, but you might grow sick of them eventually.

name: The Notebook
description: There's a room overlooking the river you can paint in. Grants extra security in times of crisis.

name: The Shape of Water
description: Establish deep connections with aquatic life, gaining their loyalty and assistance.

name: My Neighbor Totoro
description: Shield yourself and others from the elements, keeping a sense of wonder and adventure.

name: Fight Club
description: Gain the ability to temporarily rally a group of like-minded individuals.

name: Singin' In The Rain
description: You can convince someone to laugh so much they run up walls.

name: Before Sunrise
description: You can weild the magic of understanding someone sharing something.

name: Erin Brockovich
description: GIves you extra resolve to keep going until the job is done.

name: Get Out
description: See the world through a different lens, which might make you a little uncomfortable.

name: Pretty Woman
description: Gives you a chance to reroll a critical failure once per day.

name: Rocky
description: Boost to endurance. Side effects you'll eat lightning and crap thunder.

name: Cool Hand Luke
description: Represents unwavering determination to overcome any egg-based challenge.
